articles.title: Hillsong Church founder found not guilty of concealing his father's child sex crimes - NPR
articles.description: Brian Houston was ruled not guilty Thursday of an Australian charge of concealing his father's child sex crimes. He resigned from his church roles after being charged two years ago.
articles.content:
Hillsong church founder Brian Houston arrives Thursday at the Downing Centre Local Court in Sydney. He was ruled not guilty of a charge of concealing his father's child sex crimes.
Bianca De Marchi/… [+3668 chars]
